text: wallh subhanah wteala hu aldhy shiqun dia'an alsabah min zlam allyl, wajaeal allayl mstqrana, yuskin fih kl mthrk wyhda, wajaeal alshams walqamar yjryan fi flkyhma bhsab mtqn mqddar, la yataghayar wala ydtrb, dhlk taqdir aleaziz aldhy ezz sltanh, alealim bmsalh khalaqah wtdbyr shywnhm. walezyz walelym min 'asma' allah alhsna ydlan ealaa kamal alez walelm
